n = int(input())
t = input()
s = []

for i in range(n):
    if t[i] != t[i-1]:
        s.append(t[i])
print(''.join(s))


n = int(input())

t = input()

s = []

for i in range(n):
    if t[i] != t[i - 1]:
        s.append(t[i])

print(''.join(s))


n = int(input())  # number of test cases

t = input()  # string to be tested

s = []  # empty list

for i in range(n):
    if t[i] != t[i-1]:  # if the current character is different from previous
        s.append(t[i])

print(''.join(s))  # print the list as a string

n = int(input())
t = input()

s = ""
for i in range(n):
    if t[i] != t[i-1]:
        s += t[i]

print(s)

n = int(input())
t = input()
s = ""
for i in range(n):
    if t[i] != t[i-1]:
        s += t[i]

print(s)
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline


n = int(input()) 
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    if a[i] == a[i+1]:
        ans += 1
        a[i+1] = 0

print(ans)
